title: riven black cleaver build?
body:
since it will be easy to get 40% cdr without lucidity, would going a no boots build be best?

something like, {{item:3134}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3102}}   and then finish {{item:3142}} .

or maybe get 15% cdr/lvl runes with 5% masteries and get boots instead of {{item:3134}} ?
